scripts.bundle-android: node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --entry-file index.android.js --platform android --dev false --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js run-android
scripts.bundle-ios: node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --entry-file index.ios.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios/ && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js run-ios
